thread.title: Karthick Kumar says Suchithra tweets about Dhanush Sadhguru untrue - Tamil Movie News

title: Karthick Kumar says Suchithra tweets about Dhanush Sadhguru untrue - Tamil Movie News
text: Thiru Thiru Thuru Thuru directors second project dropped For a few months now the talented singer and sometime actress, Suchithra Karthik Kumar has been posting cryptic messages on her social media pages regarding a scandal at the Sadhguru Jaggi Vasudev Ashram in Coimbatore, an attack on her by Dhanushâ€™s staff and also that she is filing for a divorce. ALSO READ : Is Suchithra making false accusations against Dhanush? and Suchi-Karthick the next celebrity couple to split? While the efforts of the media to contact Suchi or her husband suspecting a possible hacking were futile, Karthick Kumar has come out with a statement on the issue clarifying that all her tweets are untrue. From his words, it is clear that there is something seriously wrong with Suchi and we hope that she gets all the help and care to emerge a victor. Suchis activity on twitter has no factual basis guys. The issue is different & personal. Pls extend understanding and let be for the while.
